Class CurveChecker

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.rtc.kernel.CurveChecker

public class CurveChecker
extends java.lang.Object

CurveChecker provides methods to check properties of a Curve.

Method Detail

isWideSenseIncreasing

public static boolean isWideSenseIncreasing(Curve c)
Tests if the passed Curve is wide-sense increasing.

A Curve f(x) is wide-sense increasing iff f(x) <= f(x+dx) for all dx >= 0.

Parameters:
c - a Curve.
Returns:
true if the Curve is wide-sense increasing; false otherwise.

isWideSenseIncreasingAllowInfinity

public static boolean isWideSenseIncreasingAllowInfinity(Curve c)
Tests if the passed Curve is wide-sense increasing. This method accepts also Curves that go to infinity.

A Curve f(x) is wide-sense increasing iff f(x) <= f(x+dx) for all dx >= 0.

Parameters:
c - a Curve.
Returns:
true if the Curve is wide-sense increasing; false otherwise.

isNonNegative

public static boolean isNonNegative(Curve c)
Tests if the passed Curve is non-negative

A Curve f(x) is non-negative iff f(x) >= 0 for all x >= 0.

Parameters:
c - a Curve.
Returns:
true if the Curve is non-negative; false otherwise.
